metadata.title: CVE-2017-11096 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: When SWFTools 0.9.2 processes a crafted file in swfcombine, it can lead toa NULL Pointer Dereference in the swf_DeleteFilter() function inlib/modules/swffilter.c.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
